pages.text: Tired of waiting for those tiny fragile babees to grow up? Use the incubator to speed up the process. Simply put the BaBee in a cage, and insert it in into the incubator together with a bunch of honey treats.

Another use for the Incubator is to infuse an egg with a specific bee type $(l:genetics/collecting#crystalline)gene$(/l) to get a spawn egg of that bee type. The bee type gene you obtain through the genetics setup.$(br)Only the type gene will be used when making a spawn egg. Any additional genes on the honey treat will be lost
